product_details.name: Venus Professional Makeup Kit - Ultimate 3-Piece Beauty Essentials
product_details.description:
• Premium liquid corrector for flawless coverage and skin tone evening
• Professional-grade mascara with lengthening and volumizing formula
• Long-lasting lip color in rich brown shade for perfect finish
• Sleek black packaging design for elegant appearance
• Travel-friendly sizes - perfect for on-the-go touch-ups
• Complete makeup solution for eyes and face in one set
• High-quality Venus brand cosmetics for professional results
• Smudge-proof and long-wearing formulations
• Dermatologically tested products for safe use
• Easy-to-apply applicators for precise makeup application

banner_details:
This banner design features a sleek and modern layout, ideal for a cosmetics product promotion. The background employs abstract circular and wavy vector shapes overlapping in soft opacities, contributing to depth and visual layering. At the center top of the composition is a bold product name (`heading`), followed by a supportive tagline (`subheading`) in a contrasting yet harmonious tone. A concise product description (`description`) appears just below. Centrally placed is a high-quality product image (`product_image`) drawing focus and balancing the composition. The price (`price`) stands out prominently in large white text below the product, and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) encourages immediacy. The design combines elegant typography with modern color contrasts for strong visual hierarchy.

**Color Palette:**
- Black (#0A0A0A) – background
- Soft Coral (#F08080) – accents, button fill
- Pale Pink (#DB7093, #C71585) – waves and overlays (with opacity)
- Rosy Brown (#BC8F8F) – background circles
- White (#FFFFFF) – main text
- Deep Pink (#F08080) – subheading text
- Dark text in CTA – Black (#000000)
product_color: The product image uses a sleek, modern color palette dominated by deep black (#000000) and accented with a coral-orange strip (#F56C57), creating a strong contrast that emphasizes elegance and boldness. White (#FFFFFF) text is used for readability against the dark background, helping highlight product details and branding. The black tones convey sophistication and professionalism, while the vivid coral brings attention to the product's functional area, ensuring visibility and interest. Subtle light reflections on the packaging add depth and realism, blending the hues smoothly while allowing each element to stand out. Ideal ad banner colors: #000000, #F56C57, #FFFFFF, #1C1C1C (dark grey).
